title.rendered: ‘Star-Crossed’ A true love story of Wild Bill Hickock and Calamity Jane wins Award of Merit for ‘Best Experimental Film’

content.rendered:
Star-Crossed – The true love story of Wild Bill and Clamity Jane

‘Star-Crossed’ Script Movie, has won The Award of Merit for Best Experimental Film. Directed by Matthew Toffolo and Written by Pamela PerryGoulardt

I stand by my actions, whatever they may be, but I am indignant when statements are made that have no truth or foundation.”

— CALAMITY JANE

SIMSBURY, CT, UNITED STATES, October 24, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Contact:
Pamela PerryGoulardt
pamela@flyingcloudstudios.com
www.FLYINGCLOUDSTUDIOS.com

Star-Crossed Script Movie Wins Award of Merit in Best Shorts Film Competition

Pamela PerryGoulardt from FlyingCloud Studios, won a prestigious Award of Merit from The Best Shorts Film Competition. The award was given to ‘Star-Crossed’ the true love story of Wild Bill Hickock and Calamity Jane – Script Movie, in association with Wildsound Film Festival [ca]. Directed by Matthew Toffolo, Narrated by Val Cole, Edited by Steve Rizzo. ‘Star-Crossed’ won in the Best Experimental Film Category.

“I am extremely proud of this acknowledgment of the innovative Script Movie created by Matthew Toffolo and his team.” Pamela PerryGoulardt

The Best Shorts Competition recognizes film, television, videography, and new media professionals who demonstrate exceptional achievement in craft and creativity, and those who produce standout entertainment or contribute to profound social change. Entries are judged by highly qualified professionals in the film and television industry. Information about Best Shorts and a list of recent winners can be found at www.BestShorts.net.

In winning a Best Shorts Award, FlyingCloud Studios and Wildsound Film Festival[ca], joins the ranks of other high-profile winners of this internationally respected award including – Academy Award winner Mr Hublot from Laurent Witz from Luxembourg, 2021 Academy Award-nominee Doug Roland for the short film Feeling Through, Disney Interactive for Vinlymation: A Love Story and so many more. Rick Prickett, who chairs The Best Shorts Competition, had this to say about the latest winners, “Best Shorts is not an easy award to win. Entries are received worldwide from powerhouse companies to remarkable new talent. The Best Shorts Competition helps set the standard for craft and creativity. The judges were pleased with the exceptionally high quality of entries. The goal of Best Shorts is to help winners achieve the recognition they deserve.”

Pamela PerryGoulardt
FlyingCloud Studios
+1 860-658-4857
